ArticleTitle.sentence: The effect of Toremifene on the expression of some genes in human mononuclear cells.

event.clue: The effect of Toremifene on the expression of some genes in human mononuclear cells.

AbstractText.sentence: Toremifene exerts multiple and varied effects on the gene expression of human peripheral mononuclear cells.

event.clue: Toremifene exerts multiple and varied effects on the gene expression of human peripheral mononuclear cells.

AbstractText.sentence: After short-term, in vitro exposure to therapeutical levels, distinct changes in P-glycoprotein, steroid receptors, p53 and Bcl-2 expression take place.

AbstractText.sentence: In view of the increasing use of antiestrogens in cancer therapy and prevention, there is obvious merit in long-term in vivo studies to be conducted.
